website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy little projector mount and a good value for the money.
pros: Easily mounts to studs and concrete
Well made, with many satisfied customers
cons: Unable to be installed in drywall or vaulted ceilings

customer_reviews.title: Good mount for smaller projectors. Didn’t fit my Epson
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be high quality, and I’m sure a bargain for most projectors out there but didn’t fit my Epson. Mount claims to have ability to fit up to 12.5 Inches but was too small to fit my Epson at 11.5 inches. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Swissing

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to configure and install - this is important since I have an Optoma HD20 that does not have standard VESA mounting holes. This bracket was easily adjustable to fit my needs. It also has many pivot points to level/balance the projector and when it is set as needed, the bolts snug up very well to prevent movement. For the price, it would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteChocolate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Product is very strong and it came with all the hardware. I looked around and saw higher prices for similar mounts. I went ahead and bought this one and I couldn’t be more satisfied. Thumbs up.. strong buy if you are looking for a good quality mount.
customer_reviews.author: JuanCa

customer_reviews.title: Work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This mount cost about 25 buck on another place I saw this and said let me tried. I’m glad I did cause I was able to match every single hole on the projector. I have benq ms616st it has 3 holes which make difficult to get a mount. But with this one no issue, just turn here slide there remove what I don’t need got it.
customer_reviews.author: ea

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is just what we were looking for to bring our family theatre room to life! It’s sleek and simple and mounts perfectly on to the ceiling. For the reviews commenting on the picture, I’d see about swapping out your screen. We bought an actual projector screen and when you set the projector up properly, the picture is crystal clear. Easy to adjust as there aren’t many adjustment options you have to play with it a bit but once you find the right position the picture is perfect. We are very happy with it and plan to hook up a roku for the kids! Thanks. For fast easy shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent construction of the ceiling attachent except the swivel bolt allowing to adjust the projector sideways. This single bolt attachement is not robust enough to provide the expected sturdiness for my 15 pound projector and the projector position can be pushed out of alignment with a simple touch. While I was able to correctly complete my installation, I am planning to replace in the near future
customer_reviews.author: PeterM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: This was half the cost of the next cheapest mount. I thought it might have less extra parts but I was wrong. It comes with all types of bolts to fit any projector! Adjusts any way necessary. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Had to dry fit the arms on the projector a few times to find the best fit. However, all the hardware I needed was included and it is super sturdy. If you don’t have vertical keystone correct and high ceilings I’d say go with something that will drop your height.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Built well and sturdy. I had to rig it a little to fit my optoma hd141x but seems to be doing the job. Cant beat gor under 20 dollars. And it came with all the hardware to mount to projector. Instructions are pretty good also. The only thing is that the workmanship is rough, and it would be better if the screws were the same color as the theme
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Best mount for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations, for 11.99 i could not be happier. the only thing hard about installing this mount is having to be up in the air working above your head, that does not affect the item itself. the adjustments are very easy to make and it comes with all the hardware you will need to install the mount. rock solid construction, I would recommend this product to anyone looking to mount a projector
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good mount
customer_reviews.text: The Projector mount is minimalistic, sturdy and flexible for most adjustments. It comes with all the screws, although drywall anchors could have been better but I would suggest to mount on a stud anyways. Be sure about its positioning, I recommend to manually hold and test run before drilling.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Happy With This Mount
customer_reviews.text: Had my BenQ projector mounted on the ceiling perfectly in about 45 mins, it was difficult for me to find a mount for my projector because it required 3 awkwardly placed holes on the bottom, but this mount adjusted perfectly to fit it, looks nice, sturdy, easy to adjust and mount, very pleased with this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Cass G

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, stable mount
customer_reviews.text: Have had the projector up for about two months, and this mount has held it's position very tightly. Picture has not shift on the wall, nor is it bother by people walking on the floor above the ceiling where it is mounted. Have had other mounts in the past that didn't work nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: NOT “Universal “ as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Although several different screw mounts are included in the box, none worked with my projector. I reached out to the vendor twice and both Rhône’s were promised a solution which has never come. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: vincent o paragone

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It appeared there were a few of these similar products marketed under different brand names, and this mount was one of the most inexpensive. It is still of good quality for a regular sized projector, and included all the mounting hardware needed. Great flexibility for ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: GMoon

customer_reviews.title: So easy even I can do it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. It has a million adjustments so even if you don't have the sharpest eye or the straightest level you can dial it in and make it look good. The versatility is a major asset. And it's plenty sturdy for holding up your projector so no worries there. I'd buy this again and again. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: ChiefWah00

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Decently sturdy. There are a lot of little pieces to assemble, and I’d like the ability to not have to essentially disassemble it to take it down; if there were a quick release, so you could take it with you I’d happily give this 5-stars. Overall it’s done as advertised and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ducks

customer_reviews.title: solid, works great and doesn't slide around.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustability is great and the bolts tighten down very tight to make sure that it doesn't go anywhere. It does have a bit of an industrial/utilitarian look to it so may not be for everybody as far os looks, but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rugby

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to mount and ample options to fit any projector. My projector only had a leveling screw on the bottom and I was able to use that as a mount only because this units swing arms can be positioned any way you need them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. Nice cheap mount.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to a piece of plywood I replaced a ceiling tile w in the basement. Have mounted 3 different projector units w zero issue. All adjustments can be clamped down w screws/bolts. Haven’t had to readjust at all, no sag etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lakkiada

customer_reviews.title: Universal Projector Mount Bracket Low Profile Multiple Adjustment Ceiling
customer_reviews.text: very cheap and very versatile, useful, good design and sturdy able to use with my Epson Home Cinema 2150. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MonJ

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hang a projector from ceiling for home theater. For the price it can't be beat. After putting it together and hanging the projector you have to align your projector and then tighten many allen head bolts. Still can move it around a bit but if left alone it is sturdy enough to work.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, and a much better deal than a $100 store bought mount.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector mount to mount my Epson 2150 for home theater use. Installation was straight forward and I had the projector mounted in about 30 minutes. The mount seems extremely sturdy when using the supplied anchor bolts to secure it to a stud. With the projector weighing roughly 8 pounds I have no worries about the mount holding up to the weight. Compared to the $100 mounts that are offered at retail stores this one was an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The projector I have didn't have any specific mounts to hang and found this one for a universal mount. Was hesitant at first to try, but it was a perfect fit and really easy to setup. Instructions were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: THE REAL TRUTH

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and has many adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This mount fit my projector perfectly. It does have many different adjustments which is nice and it comes with all mounting hardware and clear instruction. I'd recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: CaptDuke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for somthing so simple
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my need and a great price. Using it with my vankyo 510 projector
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: This would be great but.
customer_reviews.text: HDR seems to be faulty, Most HDR shows up blue, and other times the auto-darkening feature makes watching films a waste of time. As some scenes are so dark it can't be enjoyed, so HDR gets shut off. Another main issue is that it often the screen turns Pink or another color.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great mount!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great project mount but the hole pattern was different on my projecter. I have the Epson 3010. I just made a little adapter bracket for it to fit. You can also take a link out to make it closer to the ceiling which is great.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyF

customer_reviews.title: Great, So good I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector mount. Very sturdy, very reliable recommend for anyone who wants to mount their projector. I order this mount for one of my projectors and I liked it. When I decided to make a dual projector system I ordered a second one. Only problem, is the directions are kinda broad. It comes with many different types of hardware to mount with. It will take awhile to get set up. Once that is completed You will not have to ever adjusted again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great only reason I gave it 4 was because it is not shallow enough, I would have been able to do the job with just the mounting bracket and the arms but screws weren't long enough to hold them together so I had to use all the parts in the box, #iWasTooLazyToBuyMoreScrews
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff good stuff
customer_reviews.text: excellent product hear everything is solid good mountings good screws it comes with directions everything you need to get a good set up going the only problem is that if you live in a trailer or such as myself in a trailer park and somebody is doing laundry or running around the house projector just kind of shakes and it really just bad so for a house and pretty sure it's good but for anything that's that's dirty it's not
customer_reviews.author: TrippleSix

customer_reviews.title: Best projector mount for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Instructions could be a bit cleared, other than that I am extremely happy with my purchase. It worked perfectly for my bedroom setup, no complaints at all with the product, you won't find anything better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aloxxo

customer_reviews.title: this is the one
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, comes with a ton of spare washers and screws, and very reasonably priced! I am impressed by how adjustable it is. When I mounted the base to the shelf I forgot to leave clearance for the cables, but the mount allowed for me to easily adjust the position of the projector. VERY GOOD MOUNT!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed given how inexpensive it is.
customer_reviews.text: Solid machined steel, easy to follow instructions and it went up pretty easily. No complaints on my end, worked perfectly for my sloped ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The mount came in a small box but only in two pieces. The part that attaches to the projector and the one that mounts to the ceiling. It also came with a large assortment of prepackaged screws and washers to accommodate for the variety of projectors. Swivels in every direction and holds its place without much tightening. Cheap and easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ryan thornberry

customer_reviews.title: Yup, still holding
customer_reviews.text: I have had couple months now with this mount and I can tell you that it was a breeze to install. The mount is holding straight and stable yet, it is quiet easy to correct if needed.
customer_reviews.author: ItotheZ

customer_reviews.title: Not universal! Be aware! Wasted money!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit my Vamvo projector. The screws that go in holes were too short to secure to projector.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dillon

customer_reviews.title: I wish
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten one with the extension. I thought this was going to work but I needed a few more inches so I had to make one up with 2x4 wood. Ugh. This item works as described though. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great mount!
customer_reviews.text: Used to mount a generic brand projector to the ceiling in my theater room. Everything fit well and it works perfect. Doesn’t hang very low either. I love this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is great even in a semi dark room!
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution, easy to set up. The throw is perfect at 15 ft. and the brightness is very good even in a semi dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Truly universal. Shipped with all hardware needed. Easy instructions. Easy install. Easy adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Flexible projector mount
customer_reviews.text: Flexible projector mount that fits many units. Pretty easy to install and adjust. There were some extra parts accidentally included on my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Teaching at our facility, thefacilityil.com , great mount bought 2 so we could which change to a different wall when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wasco

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and fantastic Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: This company has been absolutely fantastic to work with. I am not the sharpest tool in the shed when I comes to electronics installation so we called them twice and they were most helpful along with a good sense of humor. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy from them again for the many products they offer. The projector picture quality is very close to a 1080 P wall-mounted TV. SuperValue for price versus quality
customer_reviews.author: Drew a.

customer_reviews.title: Quality above price level
customer_reviews.text: Received for less than $10 as part of damaged packaging. No damage noted definitely recommend at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike NewHouserSoninLaw

customer_reviews.title: Short Screws
customer_reviews.text: The screws that come with this are too short for my projector, so I have to send it back. It seems sturdy enough, but why not send slightly longer screws??
customer_reviews.author: M. Aishiteru

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, no extra things needed.
customer_reviews.text: Need a very low profile projector mount, this is exactly what I need. Comes with all sort of screws. Easy to install. Worked great consider how little this item costs.
customer_reviews.author: jie tao

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This fit my needs perfectly. It could be a little sturdier but as long as it is not touched it says in place just fine. It has a large range of motion and is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: projector tv
customer_reviews.text: at first i was not sure but that evening it all came together it truly is very clear for a projector
customer_reviews.author: bernard nj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive mount. Would be a 5 star if I could get it to not tilt so much.
customer_reviews.author: Candie_gurl7

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it amazon used at a discount. Unit was what I was looking for. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Romo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Would have worked well. it just didn't work for my plans so I returned
customer_reviews.author: dabestthing

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for our first at home theater projector. Definitely will be upgrading in the future to a better one. It did take us forever to get the picture to look decent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should. A little flimsy for a larger projector. But it’s a value.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly, mounted quickly, and works as explained
customer_reviews.author: GRAPEJAM6860

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a fine mount, I wish it had more range of motion to be able to point it up and down, but can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GregBoz

customer_reviews.title: Do your research, this is not a great projector...not steady at all
customer_reviews.text: Find something else, I should have returned it but missed the die date...
customer_reviews.author: AJFRANCES

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to install slips a little and need bolts tightened very tight but overall totally worth the price and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Willis

customer_reviews.title: does not fit all projector's
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit all projector's even though it is a universal mount. I had to make some alterations and add things to it to actually fit my projector
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This little mount is awesome for the price I paid. Its a little difficult to install and assemble but once its up its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great projector mount for the little amount of money spent on it. This was super easy to put together and is very sturdy and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Universal
customer_reviews.text: Fits my cheapo projector and pretty easy to adjust. Use tape to hold the position in place while putting in the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy, price cheap but quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe this is out in the world for buying Love it and can't be any more satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Vargas

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this mount to be made of thin metal since it was so much more affordable than ohers.To my surprise, it is made of heavy sturdy metal and had multiple adjustment points.After trying several other types of mounts, this one allowed for the perfect distance and angle.I would definitely encourage others to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna H

customer_reviews.title: Good product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Real good pictures and very clear perfect for the price. Also the pictures look like you there

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This required a heavy duty drill to mount, it wasn’t too easy but at least I know it’s not going anywhere

customer_reviews.title: Does everything the others do without the high price

customer_reviews.title: strong material !!
customer_reviews.text: Strong material, multiple screw sizes way many positions 5 stars all the way!

customer_reviews.title: Solid porjcetor
customer_reviews.text: So far nothing but good things for this projector. Nice picture, easy to set up

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for my awesome and reliable mount!! Great great deal indeed. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your projector fits
customer_reviews.text: It said it would git my projector but it didn't.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Allows Lots of Adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Fine adjustments for the projector is very easy. The bracket allows for adjustment in every direction needed to fine tune the projector alignment.
customer_reviews.author: AFHart

customer_reviews.title: Flexible attachment but not very versatile.  Bulky
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bulky so the joints can turn each way but they are really limited in there radius. Because of the big joints it hangs really low and there isn’t any way to make it be closer to the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: tvaughn

customer_reviews.title: very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: works for Panasonic's PT-EW640U WXGA 3LCD Projector (25 lbs) as long as it's modified. check picture.

customer_reviews.title: Good low profile mount.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to install. Lots of adjustment to attach the projector. The bolts need to be very tight to stay in place otherwise there is a slight amount of drift, but once tight it stays put.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The mount seemed to be capable of being mounted to different style and brand projectors.

customer_reviews.title: 1BEST PROJECTOR CEILING FRAME
customer_reviews.text: One tough ceiling frame for my heavy projector for 10$ wow so amazing got see what else the got forsale take my word this is the place for low budget spending and great quality for your less money 😉

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: The product holds my projector up on the ceiling just perfectly. it's very sturdy and very easy to install. No trouble at all.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with different types of screw that maybe needed.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent mount for $10. It's very easy to install if you know how to use a drill and wrench! I like that you can make so many adjustments with it to get the projector to line up right.

product_meta.title: Universal Projector Mount Bracket Low Profile Multiple Adjustment Ceiling, Hold up to 30 lbs. (PM-002-WHT), White
product_meta.description:
Style:Projector Mount| Color:White

 Will this projector mount fitting for me? Please check the following detail: 

 * Please check the wood studs on your ceiling. This mount can also be used on concrete and brick ceiling. NOTE: does NOT support vaulted ceiling and drywall. 
 * Please check the weight of your projector, the projector weight should be less than 30lbs (13.5kg). 
 * Check the mounting holes on the top of your projector and measure the distance between each hole. Your projector VESA mounting hole must be between 2” to 12.5”. 

 Why choose WALI? The benefit from WALI projector ceiling mount: 

 * High-quality heavy gauge steel support maximum weight up to 30lbs (13.5kg). 
 * Four pieces detachable bracket with angle adjustment support all 3 holes pattern or 4 holes pattern projector. 
 * The package includes three different lengths of brackets could support all types of mounting holes from 2” to 12.5”. 
 * Fully adjustable with tilt +/- 15 degrees and swivel +/- 15 degrees, bracket allows 360 degrees of rotation. 

 Newly designed projector ceiling mount: 

 * Low profile projector mounting system holding your projector just 6” from the ceiling surface. 
 * Quick release and fasten the mount to the ceiling makes installation easy. 

 Package Includes: 

 1 x WALI Projector Ceiling Mount (White) 

 1 x User Manual 

 1 x Standard Mounting Hardware
feature_bullets: Compatibility: Projector mount fit most of the projector in the market, compatible with distance mounting holes between 2" to 12.5”.
Heavy Duty: Support maximum loading weight 30 lbs/13.5 kg. Regular concrete and brick ceiling or wooden stud supported. NOTE: This mount does NOT support the vaulted ceiling and regular drywall.
Fully Adjustable: Tilt +/- 15 degrees and swivel +/- 15 degrees. Angle adjustment bracket allows 360 degrees of rotation. Low profile design for quick and precise projector positioning.
Easy installation: quick release and fasten the mount to the ceiling makes installation easy. Mounts to Wood studs, concrete and wall surfaces, flat ceiling, drop ceiling, suspended ceiling, etc.
Package Includes: WALI Projector Ceiling Mount (White) x 1, Mounting Hardware Kit x 1, User Manual x 1, 10 Years Protection.
